sense.def:
To ascribe an event or state of affairs to a particular factor
pomeni sklepati, da je tisti dejavnik povzročil določen dogodek ali stanje.

seg.quote: ...headaches which may be ascribed to stress.

sense.def:
To ascribe a quality to someone
pomeni sklepati, da tisti človek to lastnost ima.

seg.quote: Husbands are often mistaken in the virtues they ascribe to their wives.
